body: Which staff member/s inspires you to be a more like them and in what way do they inspire you?
body_tagged: Which staff member/s inspires you to be a more like them and in what way do they inspire you?
title: Which staff member inspires YOU the most?

replies.body: Quite a lot of them do, but the main staff member that inspires me is Aversively (Jake).
replies.body_tagged: Quite a lot of them do, but the main staff member that inspires me is Aversively (Jake).

replies.body: absolutely has to be thetntdude, fluenza_, or evocal. i love them so much for all they've supported me and they're huge inspirations.

replies.body: I really like the the whole staff team but out of all of them I'd have to say that Andy (Tel), Sunrise, Evocal, and Eric (glitchy) inspire me the most. They are all incredibly friendly and kind to everybody and I wish to be more like all of them someday.

replies.body:
Fluenza - Most generous, knowing and forgiving person I know.
Jake (Aversively) - Grateful all the time. 
Sulorak - Very wise and independent. Would make a good businessman :)
StormzInvader - Stormz is always happy!

Everyone on the staff team are great and inspire me in their own way!
